title: 21 nations, EU express concern over reported killings, disappearances of former Afghan security force members
content:
1. 21 nations, EU express concern over reported killings, disappearances of former Afghan security force members  The Hill
  2. US and other countries 'deeply concerned by reports of summary killings' in Afghanistan  CNN
  3. U.S. and other nations condemn Taliban over ‘summary killings’ of former security forces  NBC News
  4. Western countries express concern over Afghan reprisals, Taliban reject accusations  Reuters
  5. US, EU and 20 nations condemn Taliban over ‘summary killings’  Aljazeera.com
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
21 nations, EU express concern over reported killings, disappearances of former Afghan security force members  The Hill
US and other countries 'deeply concerned by reports of summary killings' in Afghanistan  CNN
U.S. and other nations condemn Taliban over ‘summary killings’ of former security forces  NBC News
Western countries express concern over Afghan reprisals, Taliban reject accusations  Reuters
US, EU and 20 nations condemn Taliban over ‘summary killings’  Aljazeera.com

localize.title: 21カ国とEUは、アフガニスタンの元治安部隊員の殺害と失踪の報告に懸念を表明しました。
21个国家和欧盟对报道的阿富汗前安全部队成员被杀和失踪事件表示关切
21個國家和歐盟對報道的阿富汗前安全部隊成員被殺和失蹤事件表示關切
